title: VILLAGE / POSSE 2
description: the defence part with the big defence hub etc

dialogueTree.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""He did everything he could," the l..."
dialogueTree.text: "He did everything he could," the lieutenant interrupts him. "*We* did everything we could. The company hired unvetted mercenaries. Lieutenant Du Bois got between them and the locals."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Here comes the cavalry."
links.text: Here comes the cavalry.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""He did so at considerable risk to..."
links.text: "He did so at considerable risk to his own life. He was shot, and survived only because of his armour. We stopped an execution, not a negotiation. The loss of life was minimal compared to what it could have been."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""He did so at considerable risk to..."
links.text: "He did so at considerable risk to his own life. He was shot -- not once, but twice. We stopped an execution, not a negotiation. The loss of life was minimal compared to what it could have been."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""He did so at considerable risk to..."
links.text: "He did so at considerable risk to his person. Remember -- he was shot. We stopped an execution, not a negotiation. The loss of life was minimal compared to what it could have been."

links.title: You: ""Yes. What he said.""
links.text: "Yes. What he said."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Thank you for the input, Lieutenan..."
links.text: "Thank you for the input, Lieutenant Kitsuragi. I didn't mean to suggest you didn't handle the situation..." He brushes a stray strand of hair out of his eye and coughs.

links.title: Authority: "He thinks of apologizing but decide..."
links.text: He thinks of apologizing but decides against it.

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""You've spent the week with him --..."
links.text: "You've spent the week with him -- on this case. What is your take?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""On the case?""
links.text: "On the case?"

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""On Lieutenant-Yefreitor Du Bois.""
links.text: "On Lieutenant-Yefreitor Du Bois."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Well..." He pulls up his collar. "..."
links.text: "Well..." He pulls up his collar. "The drinking, the gun-losing, also losing the badge -- that's all true. Although he has *not* been drinking on the job this week."

links.title: Judit Minot: ""See?""
links.text: "See?"

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""*One* week.""
links.text: "*One* week."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Well..." A cold gust of wind. He p..."
links.text: "Well..." A cold gust of wind. He pulls up his collar. "The drinking, the lost gun, also losing his badge -- that's all true. *And* he's been drinking on the job."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: "The man sighs. Deeply."
links.text: The man sighs. Deeply.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Then there's the apocalypse thing...."
links.text: "Then there's the apocalypse thing. At first I thought it was a joke -- but it's not. He actually thinks the world is about to end. In a *bloodletting*, or a *gloaming*. We're about to *become vapour*, even..."

"It's worrying. Especially considering his political views. Detective Du Bois is -- as you may know -- a Mazovian socio-economist. He wants to liquidate the ruling class. Which -- again -- for a police officer... is a little odd."

links.title: Rhetoric: "You should yell something."
links.text: You should yell something.

links.title: You: ""I AM A POLICEMAN OF THE STATE TO C..."
links.text: "I AM A POLICEMAN OF THE STATE TO COME!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The RCM consists of policemen of t..."
links.text: "The RCM consists of policemen of the state that *is*. So -- a little discrepancy there." He turns back to Vicquemare.

links.title: You: "That's not a good idea."
links.text: That's not a good idea.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Yes. Let's let the big boys talk."
links.text: Yes. Let's let the big boys talk.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Odder still -- he is also a full b..."
links.text: "Odder still -- he is also a full blown fascist. An ultranationalist woman-hater and more than a little racist. Which, I guess, goes well with the *grind*? I do not know -- but he is *vocal* about both beliefs."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Odder still -- he is also a full b..."
links.text: "Odder still -- he is also a full blown fascist. An ultranationalist woman-hater and more than a little racist. How he reconciles these two points of view..." He shrugs. "But he is *vocal* about both."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Odder still -- he is also an ultra..."
links.text: "Odder still -- he is also an ultraliberal 'hustler' who is always..." The lieutenant pinches the root of his nose. "*On the grind.* Which I guess, goes well with some of his racism. I don't know -- he is vocal about both beliefs though."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Odder still -- he is also an ultra..."
links.text: "Odder still -- he is also an ultraliberal 'hustler' who is always..." The lieutenant pinches the root of his nose. "*On the grind.* How he reconciles these two points of view, I do not know -- but he is vocal about both of them."

"It's worrying. Especially in light of his political views. Detective Du Bois is -- as you may know -- a fascist. A far-right woman-hater and, of course, also into race-stuff. Which -- for a police officer --" He shakes his head. "Not good."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I had a major collision with him o..."
links.text: "I had a major collision with him on the subject. He yielded, and is now striving to be a crypto-fascist. That is: a regular police officer who *thinks* these things but doesn't say them. So that's... yeah."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Odder still -- he is also a Mazovi..."
links.text: "Odder still -- he is also a Mazovian socio-economist, who believes in liquidating the ruling class. How he reconciles these two points of view, I do not know -- but he is *vocal* on both of them."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""And then there's the motor carriag..."
links.text: "And then there's the motor carriage in the sea -- something I was *not* present for..." He breathes in sharply. "But -- despite all this -- he is a great detective. One of the best I've seen, in fact."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""He can talk human beings into tell..."
links.text: "He can talk human beings into telling him anything. And he doesn't stop. In all the time I've spent with him, he has not once stopped working on the case. He is tireless. Madly driven."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Well... except that one time when..."
links.text: "Well... except that one time when he stopped to sing karaoke. Which, by the way -- I have to disagree with you, Mr. Vicquemare -- was a valiant effort. He really sang his heart out."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Okay, he did *something*...""
links.text: "Okay, he did *something*..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Other than that one time, he has t..."
links.text: "Other than that one time, he has tirelessly worked on the case. And he solved it. We have a confession, a murder weapon, *and* the perpetrator -- locked on the island right now, awaiting transportation."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Well, except that one time when he..."
links.text: "Well, except that one time when he stopped to sing karaoke. Which -- by the way -- was a valiant effort. He really sang his heart out."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Yeah... it was what it was...""
links.text: "Yeah... it was what it was..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""And he *solved* it. Near-perfectly..."
links.text: "And he *solved* it. Near-perfectly. In one week we have: a confession, a murder weapon -- *and* the perpetrator. Locked on the island right now, awaiting transportation."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""He apprehended a revolutionary bri..."
links.text: "He apprehended a revolutionary brigade who stayed hidden for fifty years, ever since the Revolution; who's probably committed other murders over those years..." He pauses. "Oh -- and he also discovered a new species."

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""A... new species?""
links.text: "A... new species?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""A colossal stick insect. It was on..."
links.text: "A colossal stick insect. It was on the island, camouflaged as the reeds. It... unfolded from the reeds. I think we may be dealing with the Insulindian phasmid."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He takes out the photo and shows it..."
links.text: He takes out the photo and shows it to the officers across the yard. Thick white snow falls all around you -- flakes stick to the glossy photo of the phasmid.

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "You hear gasps beneath the howling..."
links.text: You hear gasps beneath the howling of the wind.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""As you can see -- it's about three..."
links.text: "As you can see -- it's about three metres tall. In fact, we think it may be the largest land invertebrate ever discovered."

links.title: You: ""Hosiannah.""
links.text: "Hosiannah."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Fucking hell is that..." The man c..."
links.text: "Fucking hell is that..." The man cranes his neck, still looking at the photo. "Is this somehow... *connected* to the case?"

links.title: You: ""Boom shakalaka, motherfucker!""
links.text: "Boom shakalaka, motherfucker!"

links.title: You: ""So -- as you can see, I'm a *prett..."
links.text: "So -- as you can see, I'm a *pretty okay* detective."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Fucking hell, is that... Is this s..."
links.text: "Fucking hell, is that... Is this somehow *connected* to the case?" He ignores you, still staring at the phasmid.

links.title: You: ""This is what I've been trying to t..."
links.text: "This is what I've been trying to tell you about."

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He takes out the photo and shows it..."
links.text: He takes out the photo and shows it to the officers across the yard. Rain comes down, he covers the glossy photo of the phasmid with his hand.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He takes out the photo of the phasm..."
links.text: He takes out the photo of the phasmid and shows it to the officers across the yard. The wind blows, flapping the glossy rectangle in his hand.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""A colossal stick insect -- three m..."
links.text: "A colossal stick insect -- three metres tall. It's on the island, camouflaged as the reeds. It... unfolded from them. I did not -- unfortunately -- get a photo. But I believe it may have been the Insulindian phasmid."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""...""
Kim Kitsuragi: ""I know this sounds fantastic. But..."
links.text: "I know this sounds fantastic. But I'm a four times decorated lieutenant of the RCM. I do not make up encounters with *cryptids* to spice up my day. I am very, very sane."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""I don't doubt you, lieutenant. If..."
links.text: "I don't doubt you, lieutenant. If you say it was the Insulindian phasmid then it was the Insulindian Phasmid."

links.title: You: ""Boom shakalaka.""
links.text: "Boom shakalaka."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Lieutenant -- is it somehow *conne..."
links.text: "Lieutenant -- is it somehow *connected* to the case?" He pays you no heed.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Detective?" He turns to you."
links.text: "Detective?" He turns to you.

links.title: You: ""Boom. Boom. Boom.""
links.text: "Boom. Boom. Boom."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes -- but *also*...""
links.text: "Yes -- but *also*..."

links.title: You: ""Khm... yes. I believe the pheromon..."
links.text: "Khm... yes. I believe the pheromone it emits may be responsible for the killer's mental degradation."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The old man was not *aware* of the..."
links.text: "The old man was not *aware* of the phasmid's presence. Exhibiting a strange, atypical dementia, he fell into a stupor after its appearance. He became near-catatonic."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The killer did not seem to be *awa..."
links.text: "The killer did not seem to be *aware* of the phasmid's presence. Exhibiting a strange, atypical dementia, he fell into a stupor after its appearance. He became near-catatonic."

links.title: You: ""Boom. Boom. Boom.""
links.text: "Boom. Boom. Boom."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes -- but *also*...""
links.text: "Yes -- but *also*..."

links.title: You: ""Khm... yes, the phasmid may have c..."
links.text: "Khm... yes, the phasmid may have contributed to his mental state in some way. Over the years."

links.title: Judit Minot: ""So it *is* connected...?""
links.text: "So it *is* connected...?"

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""...""
Trant Heidelstam: ""I must say, this," he points to th..."
links.text: "I must say, this," he points to the photo, "is absolutely extraordinary. It's... I don't even have *words* for it."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Yes. It really does make it hard t..."
links.text: "Yes. It really does make it hard to fire the drunk..." His tired eyes follow the photo as the lieutenant puts it away.

links.title: Empathy: "This is a very, very sad man who ha..."
links.text: This is a very, very sad man who has just seen something that's made him forget his sadness.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Now you make your case. Now is the..."
links.text: Now you make your case. Now is the time. Now or never.

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""We could order a search. I could g..."
links.text: "We could order a search. I could get people from EPIS on the island, entomologists, doctors. There must be signs of it in the reeds -- if we found the Insulindian phasmid, well -- that would be absolutely *exceptional*. The PR value alone..."

links.title: Rhetoric: "There! You need to make your case -..."
links.text: There! You need to make your case -- now. The floor is all yours, he prepared it well.

links.title: You: ""It's probably not connected per se..."
links.text: "It's probably not connected per se -- but the perpetrator knew of its existence."

links.title: You: ""It's incredible. But it was real.""
links.text: "It's incredible. But it was real."

links.title: You: ""So -- as you can see, I'm a *prett..."
links.text: "So -- as you can see, I'm a *pretty okay* detective."

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""By god... is it somehow *connected..."
links.text: "By god... is it somehow *connected* to the case?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""He apprehended a straggler who sta..."
links.text: "He apprehended a straggler who stayed hidden for fifty years, ever since the Revolution; who's probably committed other murders over those years..." He pauses. "Oh -- and he also discovered a new species."

"It's odd. Especially in light of his political views. Detective Du Bois is -- as you may know -- a 'hustler'. He..." The lieutenant pinches the root of his nose. "Grinds. He makes *the reál*. He's a 'visionary' and a 'money engineer', which is just..." He shakes his head.

"It's just strange. Especially in light of his political views. Detective Du Bois is -- as you may know -- a true blue moralist. A man of the centre. Not prone to political outbursts. Which is commendable. But also... at odds with his behaviour."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Then there's the... superstardom...."
links.text: "Then there's the... superstardom. He likes to -- from time to time -- allude to being a *superstar law official*. At first I thought it was a joke, but... now I'm not so sure. He says *disco* about twenty times a day."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Then there's the... self-flagellat..."
links.text: "Then there's the... self-flagellation issue. He likes to apologize -- profusely. Making it sound like he's guilty of at least first degree murder. It's not a good communication strategy for an officer. It's..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Then there's the *boring cop* issu..."
links.text: "Then there's the *boring cop* issue. Despite all the obvious and almost grotesque mannerisms and sartorial choices he still insists he isn't *characteristic* enough. It's..."

links.title: You: ""I also solved the case. It's *solv..."
links.text: "I also solved the case. It's *solved*. All of it."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Detective, it's better if *I* do t..."
links.text: "Detective, it's better if *I* do that..." he says in a lowered voice.

links.title: Rhetoric: "It's so much better if he does this..."
links.text: It's so much better if he does this. A million times better.

links.title: You: ""Yeah, it was a massacre -- we got..."
links.text: "Yeah, it was a massacre -- we got wiped. Where the hell were *you*?!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Don't make this *harder* for yours..."
links.text: "Don't make this *harder* for yourself," he says in a lowered voice.

links.title: You: ""The firefight is a trivial matter..."
links.text: "The firefight is a trivial matter compared to the greatest discovery of this *century*."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Wait, it's better if I..." he says..."
links.text: "Wait, it's better if I..." he says in a lowered voice.

links.title: You: ""I'm just sorry.""
links.text: "I'm just sorry."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Stop being sorry for five minutes,..."
links.text: "Stop being sorry for five minutes," he says in a lowered voice.

dialogueTree.title: Cuno: ""Yo -- Imma stop you right there, f..."
dialogueTree.text: "Yo -- Imma stop you right there, fuck-face. It's Cuno-time."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "That's it. The cavalry has arrived."
links.text: That's it. The cavalry has arrived.

links.title: You: ""Cuno -- Shush.""
links.text: "Cuno -- Shush."

links.title: Cuno: ""No." He does not take the order. "..."
links.text: "No." He does not take the order. "Cuno's going *all in*."

links.title: Half Light: "Oh no.... *all* in."
links.text: Oh no.... *all* in.

links.title: Cuno: ""First of all, yo -- those guys wer..."
links.text: "First of all, yo -- those guys were all f****ts. The guys in the armour? F****ts. The Union guys? F****ts. So yeah --" He stares Vicquemare in the eye. "Suck Cuno's dick. You don't *know* me."

links.title: Cuno: ""You don't *know* what happened her..."
links.text: "You don't *know* what happened here. You don't know this shit. Automatic fucking weapons. Urban battleground shit. Battle lines drawn in *blood*. Blood Meridian. You don't *know* this shit."

links.title: Cuno: ""Now -- Cuno wasn't there. Right --..."
links.text: "Now -- Cuno wasn't there. Right -- you getting this? Cuno was breaking it up with Cuno's main bitch C. Parting-of-the-ways shit. But when Cuno got there -- pig had fucking *cleaned up*. Blood and ruin."

links.title: Cuno: ""Smoked all those dinky fuckers. Sa..."
links.text: "Smoked all those dinky fuckers. Saved this shit -- Martinaise shit. I see he's mournin' and shit.... His main pig got semi-wasted. Sent to the boo-boo-mobile -- Cuno steps up. Cuno fucking FILLS those shoes. Big boy shoes -- Detective Cuno."

links.title: Cuno: "He comes to a sudden, abrupt stop."
links.text: He comes to a sudden, abrupt stop.

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Are you done?""
links.text: "Are you done?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Yo, Cuno feels like you weren't re..."
links.text: "Yo, Cuno feels like you weren't really *listening* to Cuno." He drills his left temple with his index finger. "You were hearin' -- but you weren't listenin'. F***y f*g and the armour boys came to Martinaise to fuck shit up."

links.title: Cuno: ""Hardie *boys* or whatever the fuck..."
links.text: "Hardie *boys* or whatever the fuck they are -- they were tellin' everyone and their mom how they wasted one of those armour fucks. It was *always* gonna go down like that. My pig stepped up -- got fucked in the leg for it. Sacrifice style."

links.title: Rhetoric: "Not bad, Cuno. Could be a little *s..."
links.text: Not bad, Cuno. Could be a little *shorter* though.

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Yes. I understand. He was in the f..."
links.text: "Yes. I understand. He was in the fight."

links.title: Cuno: ""Second -- you dinky fucking asshol..."
links.text: "Second -- you dinky fucking asshole. This pig right here," he points to you, "this oink-oink motherfucker *solved* that shit. On Death Island. Case solved. Go home, or fuck off."

links.title: You: ""Yeah! And he's not ten, he's fucki..."
links.text: "Yeah! And he's not ten, he's fucking twelve!"

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah," he agrees, giving you a qui..."
links.text: "Yeah," he agrees, giving you a quick look. "Cuno's been around, seen shit, *real* shit -- he's not a fucking toddler!"

links.title: Empathy: "He appreciated you remembering."
links.text: He appreciated you remembering.

links.title: You: ""Cuno, if you're going to interrupt..."
links.text: "Cuno, if you're going to interrupt -- make it snappier."

links.title: Cuno: ""I'll make it tight, pig. Don't wor..."
links.text: "I'll make it tight, pig. Don't worry, the Cunn is on it."

links.title: You: ""Yes. Go home or fuck off.""
links.text: "Yes. Go home or fuck off."

links.title: Judit Minot: ""Lieutenant. Really... I...""
links.text: "Lieutenant. Really... I..."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Don't think it's a good idea to let..."
links.text: Don't think it's a good idea to let him speak.

links.title: Rhetoric: "You may want to rethink your strate..."
links.text: You may want to rethink your strategy of letting a 12 year old present your case.

links.title: You: ""Look -- point is, we solved the ca..."
links.text: "Look -- point is, we solved the case."

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah -- some fucked up grandpa did..."
links.text: "Yeah -- some fucked up grandpa did it. Fuckin' grandpa in the woods or some shit. Old shit. Cuno doesn't know about that. Look -- the REAL shit here is..."

links.title: You: ""It was a straggler -- from the Rev..."
links.text: "It was a straggler -- from the Revolution. Who's stayed in hiding for 50 years. I found him."

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah-yeah, straggler, sure." He no..."
links.text: "Yeah-yeah, straggler, sure." He nods to you, then turns back to Vicquemare. "You getting this *smart* shit? The old fuck killed him. Confessed to it too. We got him snitchin' on himself -- popo style."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""A straggler -- from the Revolution..."
links.text: "A straggler -- from the Revolution?" He sounds incredulous.

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah, fucko. He's on the island ri..."
links.text: "Yeah, fucko. He's on the island right now. In a coma or some shit. Oh -- and we also got the gun. Gun-of-the-killer shit. You know what I mean. *Now* let's get our big boy shit on..."

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "He means murder weapon."
links.text: He means murder weapon.

links.title: You: ""Wait, by gun of the killer, Cuno m..."
links.text: "Wait, by gun of the killer, Cuno means the murder weapon. We have it."

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah, spin that real shit, pig. Mu..."
links.text: "Yeah, spin that real shit, pig. Murder weapon, big boy shit."

links.title: You: ""He may have committed *other* murd..."
links.text: "He may have committed *other* murders over the years."

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah -- smoked a ton of people --..."
links.text: "Yeah -- smoked a ton of people -- unsolved shit." He nods and crosses his arms regally. "Now listen up, suit-fuck. You're gonna shit yourself, because it's gonna get wacko-natural."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Wacko-natural. I think I know what..."
links.text: Wacko-natural. I think I know what it's gonna be...

links.title: You: ""Wait. It's *not* going to get that..."
links.text: "Wait. It's *not* going to get that. Let me..."

links.title: Cuno: ""Too late -- we're *in* this. There..."
links.text: "Too late -- we're *in* this. There's a fucking FOUR-TON MANTIS on the island."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""What?!" he scoffs, then turns to y..."
links.text: "What?!" he scoffs, then turns to you. "Sorry, kid, me and Harry need to..."

links.title: Authority: "His patience has all but run out. T..."
links.text: His patience has all but run out. The boy better wrap it up...

links.title: Cuno: ""Yo -- this is like the biggest mom..."
links.text: "Yo -- this is like the biggest moment in history right now. You wanna fucking listen to what's coming out of Cuno's *mouth*." He points to his crooked scowl.

links.title: Cuno: ""We saw a giant insect. White as fu..."
links.text: "We saw a giant insect. White as fuck. *Literally* the Insulindian phasmid or some shit. Praying mantis-style. It was three metres tall, and this pig right here..." He points his finger at you.

links.title: Composure: "His hand is shaking with rage and e..."
links.text: His hand is shaking with rage and excitement.

links.title: Cuno: ""This fucking *old* popo *discovere..."
links.text: "This fucking *old* popo *discovered* it. Me and the pig-bacon discovered a new *species*. It was beautiful. It was..." He pauses, out of breath, then continues: "You ain't seen this kind of animal before. Fucking *miracle* shit."

links.title: Empathy: "He gulps, overcome with awe."
links.text: He gulps, overcome with awe.

links.title: Cuno: ""This case -- this fucking grandpa..."
links.text: "This case -- this fucking grandpa shit.... this ugly shit? It's *nothing*. We saw a ghost. A real life ghost. Like he fucking proved *ghosts* are real -- it's that big, popo. It's fucking..."

links.title: Perception (Sight): "His eyes are welling up now."
links.text: His eyes are welling up now.

links.title: Cuno: ""Why are you not fucking shitting y..."
links.text: "Why are you not fucking shitting yourselves -- what's wrong?!" He glares at the officers standing silently in the falling snow. They look back at him, seemingly at a loss.

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""Did he just say... Insulindian pha..."
links.text: "Did he just say... Insulindian phasmid?"

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""I don't know. I zoned out. Harry -..."
links.text: "I don't know. I zoned out. Harry --" He turns you. "Did you just pick up some island bum and pin it on him?"

links.title: Cuno: ""You aren't fucking *listening*! Th..."
links.text: "You aren't fucking *listening*! The bum is nothing. This is science history here. It was the Insulindian phasmid. It's *connected* to this shit." He turns to you. "Tell him!"

links.title: You: ""There was no Insulindian phasmid.""
links.text: "There was no Insulindian phasmid."

links.title: Cuno: ""WHAT?! I can't fucking *believe* t..."
links.text: "WHAT?! I can't fucking *believe* this shit... He's lying!" He turns back to them. "He's fucking lying. We were *just* there, he went up to it. He fucking touched it!"

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""This sounds insane, Harry. What di..."
links.text: "This sounds insane, Harry. What did you *do* on that island?"

links.title: Empathy: "He's genuinely alarmed now."
links.text: He's genuinely alarmed now.

links.title: You: ""There was an Insulindian phasmid...."
links.text: "There was an Insulindian phasmid. But it's not connected to the case."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""...""
Judit Minot: ""Lieutenant, please -- you have to..."
links.text: "Lieutenant, please -- you have to have more than just some *mantis*. The straggler -- stick to that. You said you solved the murder."

links.title: Logic: "It's not going well. Present someth..."
links.text: It's not going well. Present something now -- something sane and clear. Make your case.

links.title: Authority: "Something that proves you haven't l..."
links.text: Something that proves you haven't lost your mind.

links.title: Volition: "No. There was a giant insect and th..."
links.text: No. There was a giant insect and they *have* to understand that. You will find proof. Don't give up.

links.title: Authority: "It's not going well. You have to pr..."
links.text: It's not going well. You have to present something now. Something sane and forceful. Make your case.

links.title: You: ""There was an Insulindian phasmid...."
links.text: "There was an Insulindian phasmid. *And* it may be connected to the case."

links.title: Cuno: ""Why are you not fucking shitting y..."
links.text: "Why are you not fucking shitting yourselves -- what's wrong?!" He glares at the officers standing silently in the rain. The water is coming down hard, washing the concrete...

links.title: Cuno: ""Why are you not fucking shitting y..."
links.text: "Why are you not fucking shitting yourselves -- what's wrong?!" He glares at the officers, who stand silently in the cold wind. In the distance a wave breaks...

links.title: You: ""Oh yeah, it's going to get wacko-n..."
links.text: "Oh yeah, it's going to get wacko-natural. Tell him."

links.title: Cuno: ""There's a fucking FOUR-TON MANTIS..."
links.text: "There's a fucking FOUR-TON MANTIS on the island."

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: Cuno: ""There's a fucking FOUR-TON MANTIS..."
links.text: "There's a fucking FOUR-TON MANTIS on the island."

links.title: You: ""He may have committed other murder..."
links.text: "He may have committed other murders over the years -- we have him confessing to one too. A big one."

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah, big shit. We taking them *al..."
links.text: "Yeah, big shit. We taking them *all* down. We cleaning this shit up." He nods and crosses his arms, regally. "Now listen up suit-fuck. You're gonna shit yourself, because it's gonna get wacko-natural."

links.title: You: ""Uh -- big boy shit?""
links.text: "Uh -- big boy shit?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah, big shit." He nods and cross..."
links.text: "Yeah, big shit." He nods and crosses his arms, regally. "Now listen up suit-fuck. You're gonna shit yourself, because it's gonna get wacko-natural."

links.title: You: ""Look -- point is, we saved as many..."
links.text: "Look -- point is, we saved as many people as we could."

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah -- and solved that shit. Fuck..."
links.text: "Yeah -- and solved that shit. Fucking... grandpa in the woods did it. Old shit. Cuno doesn't know about that. Look -- the REAL SHIT here is..."

links.title: You: ""I did everything I could. The comp..."
links.text: "I did everything I could. The company had hired unvetted..."

links.title: Cuno: ""No." He stops you. "You've explain..."
links.text: "No." He stops you. "You've explained enough, pig. Cuno takes care of this shit now."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "There is *no* challenging the fury..."
links.text: There is *no* challenging the fury the kid is about to unleash.

dialogueTree.title: You: ""The company hired unvetted mercena..."
dialogueTree.text: "The company hired unvetted mercenaries. It was their fault. I did all I could."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""You went in drunk and got people k..."
links.text: "You went in drunk and got people killed." He shakes his head. "Why are you even *here* -- after Kitsuragi got shot? What else could you possibly fuck up?"

links.title: Volition: "Stop taking this abuse. YOU. SOLVED..."
links.text: Stop taking this abuse. YOU. SOLVED. THE. CASE.

links.title: You: ""I solved the case. A straggler fro..."
links.text: "I solved the case. A straggler from the Revolution shot the merc. He was hiding for *fifty* years on that island before I found him."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""A straggler? From the *Revolution?..."
links.text: "A straggler? From the *Revolution?*" He sounds incredulous.

links.title: You: ""Yeah -- from the Revolution. He ma..."
links.text: "Yeah -- from the Revolution. He may have killed others too."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""What is this man -- eighty? Ninety..."
links.text: "What is this man -- eighty? Ninety? What are we talking about here? A *octogenarian* sniper?"

links.title: You: ""It's wild. But I have a confession..."
links.text: "It's wild. But I have a confession *and* a murder weapon. He's on the island now -- waiting for arrest."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""You just left him on the island --..."
links.text: "You just left him on the island -- unguarded?"

links.title: Logic: "There is a *perfect* explanation fo..."
links.text: There is a *perfect* explanation for that!

links.title: Drama: "Don't tell him about the phasmid. H..."
links.text: Don't tell him about the phasmid. He *will not* believe it. IT. DIDN'T. HAPPEN.

links.title: You: ""It's okay. A giant insect -- three..."
links.text: "It's okay. A giant insect -- three metres tall -- came out of the reeds and left him in a catatonic state."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""This is *not* a joke. We *will* du..."
links.text: "This is *not* a joke. We *will* dump you, Harry. We will leave you here -- and you'll be just another bum on the coast. Take this as your *trial*. Stop fucking around."

links.title: You: ""It's no joke. I found the Insulind..."
links.text: "It's no joke. I found the Insulindian phasmid. I discovered a new species."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""This sounds insane, Harry. What di..."
links.text: "This sounds insane, Harry. What did you *do* on that island? What happened to you?"

links.title: Empathy: "He's genuinely concerned now."
links.text: He's genuinely concerned now.

links.title: Judit Minot: ""Lieutenant, please. The straggler..."
links.text: "Lieutenant, please. The straggler -- just... stick to that. You said you *solved* the case?"

links.title: Logic: "She's right. This is not going well..."
links.text: She's right. This is not going well for you. You have to present something coherent -- and sane.

links.title: Authority: "Something that proves you haven't c..."
links.text: Something that proves you haven't completely lost it. Something *solid*. You've *done* things. Good things. List those.

links.title: Volition: "No. There was a giant insect and th..."
links.text: No. There was a giant insect and they *have* to understand that. You will find proof. Don't give up.

links.title: You: ""Khm... I *also* started a night cl..."
links.text: "Khm... I *also* started a night club. In the church."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Actually -- you didn't.""
links.text: "Actually -- you didn't."

links.title: You: ""What do you mean?""
links.text: "What do you mean?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I told them a police raid will swe..."
links.text: "I told them a police raid will sweep the church in two days. Which, by the way -- it will. If they have any brains they won't be producing in there."

links.title: You: ""Wait -- when did you do this?""
links.text: "Wait -- when did you do this?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""When you were out.""
links.text: "When you were out."

links.title: You: ""Why?""
links.text: "Why?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Because I'm a police detective. An..."
links.text: "Because I'm a police detective. And manufacturing drugs is *illegal*."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Wait -- he tried to set up a drug..."
links.text: "Wait -- he tried to set up a drug lab?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No. He just let some youths set up..."
links.text: "No. He just let some youths set up a club in the church. They *thought* they could produce in there. They won't. The building was abandoned. It was an okay idea -- better than having them out on the ice."

links.title: Drama: "He's really softening it up there."
links.text: He's really softening it up there.

links.title: You: ""Uhm... Okay then.""
links.text: "Uhm... Okay then."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes -- it's very okay.""
links.text: "Yes -- it's very okay."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""What?" He cups his ear -- the wind..."
links.text: "What?" He cups his ear -- the wind blows. "It sounded like you set up a drug lab!"

links.title: You: ""I didn't. It's the wind. You mishe..."
links.text: "I didn't. It's the wind. You misheard."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""It wasn't the fucking wind! You sa..."
links.text: "It wasn't the fucking wind! You said you started a drug lab." He takes a moment to collect himself. "Fine. I don't care. You're done as a cop -- become a polonium dealer for all I care."

links.title: Cuno: ""Stop squealing on yourself. Cuno *..."
links.text: "Stop squealing on yourself. Cuno *needs* to get out of this shithole." He turns to Vicquemare. "Pig's talking whack to impress you. It didn't go down like that. He done good. Tell them!"

links.title: Suggestion: "You know -- it might have been a *b..."
links.text: You know -- it might have been a *bad* idea to tell him that. Unless you want to be a drug baron and not a cop, of course...

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Hmm..."
links.text: Hmm...

links.title: You: ""Yeah. *And* a night club. In the c..."
links.text: "Yeah. *And* a night club. In the church. It was a huge operation to set it up."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Fuck it. Fine. I don't care. Your..."
links.text: "Fuck it. Fine. I don't care. Your life as a cop is over -- become a polonium dealer for all I care."

links.title: You: ""Yeah, and the club is called *Disc..."
links.text: "Yeah, and the club is called *Disco Elysium*."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""I don't care what your drug lab is..."
links.text: "I don't care what your drug lab is called..." He calms himself. "Fuck it. You're done as a cop -- become a polonium dealer for all I care."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""What was that?" He cups his ear --..."
links.text: "What was that?" He cups his ear -- the wind blows. "It sounded like you set up a night club in the church."

links.title: You: ""Yeah, I reinvigorated the local ni..."
links.text: "Yeah, I reinvigorated the local nightlife."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Four kids were living in a tent on..."
links.text: "Four kids were living in a tent on the ice. They were going to drown when it melted. It's not optimal, but the building *was* abandoned. So he put them in there. It's okay."

links.title: Suggestion: "It's not *that* okay. Get off this..."
links.text: It's not *that* okay. Get off this subject. Now.

links.title: You: ""Yeah! I did some kids a solid. Tur..."
links.text: "Yeah! I did some kids a solid. Turned their lives around."

links.title: You: ""Yeah! And I discovered a hitherto..."
links.text: "Yeah! And I discovered a hitherto unexplored entroponetical phenomenon in there too -- a two-millimetre hole in the world."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Get a grip. No one cares about you..."
links.text: "Get a grip. No one cares about your *entroponetic adventures* right now."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""That's great! *Entroponaut* is a g..."
links.text: "That's great! *Entroponaut* is a great new career for you -- *after* police officer. I don't care. Go live in the pale."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""What was that?" He cups his ear --..."
links.text: "What was that?" He cups his ear -- the wind blows. "It sounded like you set up a night club in the church."

links.title: You: ""Yeah! I reinvigorated the local ni..."
links.text: "Yeah! I reinvigorated the local nightlife."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""That's great! *Night club owner* i..."
links.text: "That's great! *Night club owner* is a great new career -- because you're *done* as a police officer."

links.title: Cuno: ""Get off the church-shit. It's maki..."
links.text: "Get off the church-shit. It's making you sound crazy."

links.title: Suggestion: "This isn't going to change a lot of..."
links.text: This isn't going to change a lot of minds, Harry.

links.title: You: ""Yeah! I did some kids a solid. Tur..."
links.text: "Yeah! I did some kids a solid. Turned their lives around."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""You turned a church into a night c..."
links.text: "You turned a church into a night club -- the *kids* are probably shooting up in there... What else did you do? Desecrate the altar? Shit in the chancel?"

links.title: You: ""Yeah! And I discovered a hitherto..."
links.text: "Yeah! And I discovered a hitherto unexplored entroponetical phenomenon in there too -- a two-millimetre hole in the world."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""That's great! *Entroponaut* is a g..."
links.text: "That's great! *Entroponaut* is a great new career for you -- *after* police officer. I don't care. Go live in the fucking pale."

links.title: You: ""Also, the phasmid was female. The..."
links.text: "Also, the phasmid was female. The reeds are its nest."

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""Female? What makes you think so?""
links.text: "Female? What makes you think so?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You had to see it... It had the su..."
links.text: "You had to see it... It had the subdued colours of a female. And the nesting behaviour too, I think."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "It was definitely female."
links.text: It was definitely female.

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""Incredible... Were there eggs in t..."
links.text: "Incredible... Were there eggs in the nest?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Not as far as I could see. There w..."
links.text: "Not as far as I could see. There were other things there, though..." He turns to you.

links.title: Conceptualization: "It's *interesting* time. Forget abo..."
links.text: It's *interesting* time. Forget about the rest.

links.title: You: ""It had gathered *items* in its nes..."
links.text: "It had gathered *items* in its nest: behold, a passport."

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""Actually, you know -- this would i..."
links.text: "Actually, you know -- this would indicate it was a male. This is far from anything in my field, but I think such nests are called 'bowers'. They are for attracting mates."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Bowers are built by males of specie..."
links.text: Bowers are built by males of species who can't afford colourful mating displays physically -- this one *was* plain coloured...

links.title: You: ""I still think it was female.""
links.text: "I still think it was female."

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""Of course. As I said, I'm only gue..."
links.text: "Of course. As I said, I'm only guessing. *I* didn't see it." He pauses, turning something over in his head. "It must be robust, if it can move a whole helmet with its limbs..."

links.title: Savoir Faire: "It could maybe roll it? Like a dung..."
links.text: It could maybe roll it? Like a dung-beetle.

links.title: You: ""It could have been male, actually...."
links.text: "It could have been male, actually..."

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""It must be robust if it can move a..."
links.text: "It must be robust if it can move a helmet with its limbs..." He trails off, lost in thought.

links.title: You: ""It had gathered *items* in its nes..."
links.text: "It had gathered *items* in its nest: a helmet, a scope, and a passport."

links.title: You: ""It had gathered *items* in its nes..."
links.text: "It had gathered *items* in its nest: a helmet and a scope."

links.title: You: ""I think it reproduces by parthenog..."
links.text: "I think it reproduces by parthenogenesis."

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""As in cloning itself? What makes y..."
links.text: "As in cloning itself? What makes you think so?"

links.title: You: ""Observation.""
links.text: "Observation."

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""Well -- then it wouldn't matter if..."
links.text: "Well -- then it wouldn't matter if it's male or female. The bower would just be rudimentary behaviour from before the parthenogenetic mutation."

links.title: Logic: "That makes sense, yes."
links.text: That makes sense, yes.

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""Very interesting." He looks around..."
links.text: "Very interesting." He looks around, quickly assessing the coast. "Such organisms are extremely vulnerable to disease. A single strain of bacteria could wipe out the whole species. We're probably looking at conservation efforts here..."

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""Interesting... Then it is *especia..."
links.text: "Interesting... Then it is *especially* vulnerable to disease. A single strain of bacteria could wipe out the entire species. We're *probably* talking conservation efforts here..." He looks around, quickly assessing the coast.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "In his mind he's already planning a..."
links.text: In his mind he's already planning a nature reserve and *knows a good guy* for that.

links.title: You: ""Just a hunch.""
links.text: "Just a hunch."

links.title: You: ""It told me.""
links.text: "It told me."

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""Mhm..." He ignores your answer. "T..."
links.text: "Mhm..." He ignores your answer. "Then it wouldn't matter if it's male or female. The bower would just be rudimentary behaviour from before the parthenogenetic mutation."

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""Interesting..." He ignores your an..."
links.text: "Interesting..." He ignores your answers. "Then it is *especially* vulnerable to disease. A single strain of bacteria could wipe out the entire species. We're probably talking conservation efforts here..." He looks around, quickly assessing the coast.

links.title: You: ""I think it emits a chemical that m..."
links.text: "I think it emits a chemical that makes it look even more like the reeds."

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""Hmm, yes. That would be a kairomon..."
links.text: "Hmm, yes. That would be a kairomone -- a pheromone that's seemingly beneficial to the host. It usually stimulates the affected nervous system -- not a human's, of course, but perhaps a predator's?"

links.title: You: ""The perpetrator seemed intoxicated..."
links.text: "The perpetrator seemed intoxicated somehow. Like an addict. It's just a hunch, but..."

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""There are species of bees that, un..."
links.text: "There are species of bees that, under the influence of kairomones, take wasp larvae to their hives. Ants do the same with aphids thinking they're..." he stops. "Do you think this is how it's stayed hidden?"

links.title: You: "Keep it to yourself."
links.text: Keep it to yourself.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Nothing is off the table, but -- I..."
links.text: "Nothing is off the table, but -- I want to stress this -- the find does not have to be connected to the case. The case is 100% prosecutable -- without *any* kairomones."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Of course, lieutenant. Of course...."
links.text: "Of course, lieutenant. Of course. We should treat the case and the phasmid as completely separate from each other. People are not going to..." He shakes his head.

links.title: Judit Minot: ""They're not going to go for this s..."
links.text: "They're not going to go for this speculation in the Constabulatory."

links.title: You: ""Its nervous system may be stored i..."
links.text: "Its nervous system may be stored in its long limbs."

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""Like a cephalopod's? Phasmids, I t..."
links.text: "Like a cephalopod's? Phasmids, I think, only have nerves in their heads and abdomens, though... there is a correlation between invertebrate size and intelligence. Was it...?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No. I wouldn't say it was..." He l..."
links.text: "No. I wouldn't say it was..." He looks to you.

links.title: You: ""Intelligent? It behaved like an in..."
links.text: "Intelligent? It behaved like an insect."

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""Of course. I'm getting ahead of my..."
links.text: "Of course. I'm getting ahead of myself. Stick insects have primitive nervous systems. Still -- this creature would have a lot of surface area to put neurons into..."

links.title: You: ""It was a sensing entity. There was..."
links.text: "It was a sensing entity. There was something there."

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: "He nods. "At that size, this creatu..."
links.text: He nods. "At that size, this creature would have a lot of surface area to put neurons into. It's basic geometry."

links.title: You: ""To me it seemed to have... *some*..."
links.text: "To me it seemed to have... *some* character."

links.title: You: "(Conclude.) "It had mandibles that..."
links.text: (Conclude.) "It had mandibles that looked like hair. And it was completely white on the inside."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, but also reed-coloured -- bei..."
links.text: "Yes, but also reed-coloured -- beige and brown, a little green -- on the outside. After unfolding from a single stalk, it still retained parts that looked like reed tufts on its limbs."

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""Incredible..." he repeats, turning..."
links.text: "Incredible..." he repeats, turning to Vicquemare. "The PR value of this is exceptional. 'Cop Discovers New Species.' Maybe even: 'Discovers the Insulindian Phasmid.' No... That's too much."

links.title: Judit Minot: ""This would really help with some o..."
links.text: "This would really help with some of the... *problems* we've been having."

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""Absolutely -- this is great. This..."
links.text: "Absolutely -- this is great. This does not say 'vigilante murderers' to me at all. This says: science, news, human interest." He smiles. "You know, it's a really good thing you have that photo."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Without it..." He shakes his head."
links.text: "Without it..." He shakes his head.

links.title: Suggestion: "You're doing good here. Perhaps onl..."
links.text: You're doing good here. Perhaps only for a moment, but still...

links.title: Authority: "Quit while you're ahead? Or... no?"
links.text: Quit while you're ahead? Or... no?

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""Incredible..." he repeats, turning..."
links.text: "Incredible..." he repeats, turning to Vicquemare. "It's a toughie that you don't have a photo. This would look very, very flashy in the papers. None of it says *vigilante murderers* to me at all. Great PR."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I tried to... but I only got a blu..."
links.text: "I tried to... but I only got a blur."

links.title: Empathy: "Ouch..."
links.text: Ouch...

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""We can still work 'Cop Discovers N..."
links.text: "We can still work 'Cop Discovers New Species' in there. I know a good guy in La Majeste. But only *after* the École Supérieure people find it. This *cannot* be done by fringe people."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""It needs to be white coats and gla..."
links.text: "It needs to be white coats and glassware for this fly. We need professionals..." He looks at the reeds.

links.title: Shivers: "In the mist-coloured distance over..."
links.text: In the mist-coloured distance over the water, nothing moves. No trace of it...

links.title: You: ""The killer -- Lilianovich Dros --..."
links.text: "The killer -- Lilianovich Dros -- we have a strong motive for him."

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""Lilianovich?" The special consulta..."
links.text: "Lilianovich?" The special consultant raises an eyebrow. "A Revolutionary matronym..."

links.title: You: ""A Revolutionary matronym?""
links.text: "A Revolutionary matronym?"

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""The custom started in Graad, where..."
links.text: "The custom started in Graad, where they have patronyms: Krasovich, Larsovich, etc. The revolutionaries saw this as a chauvinist atavism so they used matronyms, derived from the mother's name, instead."

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""This man's mother was Lilian. He's..."
links.text: "This man's mother was Lilian. He's Lilian's son -- Lilianovich. The custom was overturned after the Revolution failed, but not before it made it to Revachol."

links.title: Judit Minot: ""So... it *is* what a soldier of th..."
links.text: "So... it *is* what a soldier of the ICM would be called."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Thank you, Trant. Thank you for th..."
links.text: "Thank you, Trant. Thank you for that piece of cultural theory." He turns to you. "You said you have a *motive*."

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""This man would be Lilian's son --..."
links.text: "This man would be Lilian's son -- Lilianovich." He turns to Vicquemare. "The custom was overturned after the revolutions failed, but not before making it to Revachol."

links.title: Logic: "He thinks this detail bolsters your..."
links.text: He thinks this detail bolsters your straggler theory.

links.title: Judit Minot: ""It *is* what a soldier of the ICM..."
links.text: "It *is* what a soldier of the ICM would be called."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Okay, Trant, thank you. I get it...."
links.text: "Okay, Trant, thank you. I get it. Harry..." He looks at you sternly. "No more giant insects -- you said you have a *motive*."

links.title: Cuno: ""This narrow-minded pig," he mumble..."
links.text: "This narrow-minded pig," he mumbles, drilling his temples with his index fingers. "I can't fucking..."

links.title: Authority: "Bring him to heel."
links.text: Bring him to heel.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Get the kid in line. You could use..."
links.text: Get the kid in line. You could use his help here.

links.title: You: ""I don't have time for this. Straig..."
links.text: "I don't have time for this. Straight to the motive, please."

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""Of course. Excuse me. I just thoug..."
links.text: "Of course. Excuse me. I just thought it was noteworthy."

links.title: Logic: "He wasn't quite sure about the stra..."
links.text: He wasn't quite sure about the straggler before he heard this detail. It must have convinced him.

links.title: You: ""Cuno. Keep your head in the game.""
links.text: "Cuno. Keep your head in the game."

links.title: Cuno: ""Alright, yeah." He bites his lip...."
links.text: "Alright, yeah." He bites his lip. "Cuno's in it."

links.title: Empathy: "He understands you *have* to nail t..."
links.text: He understands you *have* to nail this.

links.title: You: ""He killed the mercenary in an act..."
links.text: "He killed the mercenary in an act of jealousy."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Jealousy... I thought this Liliano..."
links.text: "Jealousy... I thought this Lilianovich was an old man. To have been hiding for fifty years... seventy-something?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""A strange psychosexual fixation. A..."
links.text: "A strange psychosexual fixation. Aggravated -- possibly -- by proximity to the phasmid and its chemicals. He himself gave a political reason -- said he had killed an enemy combatant."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He nods. "A strange psychosexual fa..."
links.text: He nods. "A strange psychosexual fascination. The result of spending all this time in solitude, on the islands of this bay... And trauma too. He himself gave a political reason. In his mind, he had killed an enemy combatant."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Jealousy? He's what -- eighty? *Ni..."
links.text: "Jealousy? He's what -- eighty? *Ninety*? Didn't you say he's been in hiding since the Revolution?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah, suit. Check this shit out --..."
links.text: "Yeah, suit. Check this shit out -- the merc was bangin' some chick he wanted to bang. So he shot him. Chick's called Klaasje."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Klaasje -- as in the suspect he le..."
links.text: "Klaasje -- as in the suspect he let escape? From Kitsuragi's report?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Fucking snitch binoclard..." He co..."
links.text: "Fucking snitch binoclard..." He collects himself. "Yeah -- that chick. Get over it pig, she didn't do it. It was grandpa on the island. Merc was fuckin' her and he couldn't hack it. Cuno can hack it."

links.title: You: ""He also had political reasons.""
links.text: "He also had political reasons."

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah. Politics shit. My pig also c..."
links.text: "Yeah. Politics shit. My pig also connected, like... the weapon to him..." He looks to you.

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "Slam the weapon man, the murder wea..."
links.text: Slam the weapon man, the murder weapon.

links.title: You: ""He's a trained sniper. The weapon..."
links.text: "He's a trained sniper. The weapon he used is more than capable of making the shot."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Okay." He rubs his temples. "And h..."
links.text: "Okay." He rubs his temples. "And he'll confess? To the *prosecution* too?"

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Klaasje -- as in the suspect Lieut..."
links.text: "Klaasje -- as in the suspect Lieutenant Kitsuragi brought in? I've read his reports -- don't fuck with me."

links.title: Cuno: ""Snitch binoclard..." He collects h..."
links.text: "Snitch binoclard..." He collects himself. "Yeah. Klaasje -- that chick. But she didn't do it. It was this old fuck. Grandpa on the island. Merc was fucking her and he couldn't hack it. Cuno can hack it."

links.title: You: ""He, uh... being a Communard probab..."
links.text: "He, uh... being a Communard probably had to do with it. You know, class warfare stuff."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""And it worked? He got a war going?""
links.text: "And it worked? He got a war going?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes -- until we stopped it." The l..."
links.text: "Yes -- until we stopped it." The lieutenant is quick to correct him. "He saw the mercenary as an *enemy combatant* -- there's plenty for prosecution to pick from, as far as motive is concerned."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Also -- we have ballistics from th..."
links.text: "Also -- we have ballistics from the gun, matching the bullet found in the dead mercenary's head. *And* two officers on the scene that Mr. Dros *confessed* to."

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah. Check this shit -- he's like..."
links.text: "Yeah. Check this shit -- he's like some fucking old school warrior. Man From Hjelmdall shit. Only against rich people and... pederasts I think? Cuno doesn't know what a pederast is, Cuno's not a university..."

links.title: Cuno: ""But he did that shit. To get the U..."
links.text: "But he did that shit. To get the Union fucks killed, so they'd get the other fucks killed. Boom! Giant kill-storm. Mastermind shit -- only, like, a really old mastermind who's fucking stupid."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Okay. Mastermind.""
links.text: "Okay. Mastermind."

links.title: Logic: "He's not getting it."
links.text: He's not getting it.

links.title: You: ""Wait -- Jean. Was there *not* a gi..."
links.text: "Wait -- Jean. Was there *not* a giant kill-storm?"

links.title: Cuno: ""You were *just* up his asscrack fo..."
links.text: "You were *just* up his asscrack for the mass murder shit. Now it's nothing? Why do you think that shit *happened?*"

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""...""
Cuno: ""You ain't saying shit, because you..."
links.text: "You ain't saying shit, because you don't got shit to say."

links.title: You: ""He's a trained sniper. The weapon..."
links.text: "He's a trained sniper. The weapon he used is more than capable of making the shot."

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah, like... the ballistics too,..."
links.text: "Yeah, like... the ballistics too, pig. We got him *knee deep* in popo shit."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Okay, Cuno -- okay." He rubs his t..."
links.text: "Okay, Cuno -- okay." He rubs his temples, then turns to you. "And he'll confess? To *prosecution* too?"

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Fine. Brilliant theory. A real mas..."
links.text: "Fine. Brilliant theory. A real masterpiece. You'll get a station call and you can tell all about it -- to some *other* officer. We'll send the coast guard to the island. Maybe they'll find your giant insect too."

links.title: Judit Minot: ""Jean, maybe..." She stops and sigh..."
links.text: "Jean, maybe..." She stops and sighs.

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Jude, he's drunk. It's cold. I'm f..."
links.text: "Jude, he's drunk. It's cold. I'm fucking freezing. Let's get him to the station when he's sobered up. In two weeks or something."

links.title: Endurance: "The iron smell of blood rises to yo..."
links.text: The iron smell of blood rises to your mouth.

links.title: Inland Empire: "That's it. The verdict."
links.text: That's it. The verdict.

links.title: You: ""He killed the mercenary hoping to..."
links.text: "He killed the mercenary hoping to start a war between the company and the Union."

links.title: You: ""He killed him in an act of rage in..."
links.text: "He killed him in an act of rage induced by the phasmid's semiochemicals."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""*Possibly* induced," he corrects y..."
links.text: "*Possibly* induced," he corrects you. "But even without that -- this man spent fifty years on the islands in the bay. In solitude. Loathing what Revachol has become. There's plenty for prosecution to pick from in terms of motive."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Also -- we have a sniper's nest wi..."
links.text: "Also -- we have a sniper's nest with full view of the room in which the mercenary died. Right on the island. *And* two officers on the scene that Mr. Dros *confessed* to."

links.title: Judit Minot: ""It's a clean win.""
links.text: "It's a clean win."

links.title: Conceptualization: "Oh, it's *way* more than that."
links.text: Oh, it's *way* more than that.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Way, *way* more."
links.text: Way, *way* more.

links.title: You: ""It's more than that -- a perfect f..."
links.text: "It's more than that -- a perfect folding mechanism. Like the phasmid."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""*Perfect folding mechanism*..." He..."
links.text: "*Perfect folding mechanism*..." He rolls his eyes. "Get over yourself, Harry -- I can still smell the booze on the wind."

links.title: Perception (Smell): "God dammit, doesn't it ever *leave*..."
links.text: God dammit, doesn't it ever *leave*?! It *is* there! Like, in your bones or something...

links.title: Volition: "It will pass -- in time."
links.text: It will pass -- in time.

links.title: Perception (Smell): "God dammit -- it *is* bad. Even you..."
links.text: God dammit -- it *is* bad. Even you can smell it.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "It's just a little celebration."
links.text: It's just a little celebration.

links.title: Volition: "Chin up. Keep focusing on the posit..."
links.text: Chin up. Keep focusing on the positives here.

links.title: You: ""It's *way* more than that. It will..."
links.text: "It's *way* more than that. It will win me Dora back."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""That's not how personal relationsh..."
links.text: "That's not how personal relationships work, Harry. You found a straggler. The first since the Thirties. Kudos. But that doesn't *change* anything."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""It doesn't hide the smell of booze..."
links.text: "It doesn't hide the smell of booze on the wind either." He buttons his jacket.

links.title: You: ""It's *way* more than that. I'll wi..."
links.text: "It's *way* more than that. I'll win her back with this."

links.title: Inland Empire: "Win *who* back, you don't even know..."
links.text: Win *who* back, you don't even know her name!

links.title: You: ""It's my masterpiece. They'll teach..."
links.text: "It's my masterpiece. They'll teach this in cop-school."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""*Masterpiece*..." He rolls his eye..."
links.text: "*Masterpiece*..." He rolls his eyes. "Get over yourself, Harry -- I can still smell the booze on the wind."

links.title: You: ""I did all I could. Every second wa..."
links.text: "I did all I could. Every second was a struggle."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""I've never doubted you can pull yo..."
links.text: "I've never doubted you can pull yourself together and work -- in bouts. Bouts don't last." He buttons his jacket. "I can still smell the booze on the wind."

links.title: You: ""I'm still not *completely* satisfi..."
links.text: "I'm still not *completely* satisfied with it. It could be just a *little* neater."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Get over yourself -- you're not a..."
links.text: "Get over yourself -- you're not a *perfectionist*. You're a cop and you did a good job. With a lot of help from Lieutenant Kitsuragi."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""And none of this can hide the smel..."
links.text: "And none of this can hide the smell of booze on the wind." He buttons his jacket.

links.title: Inland Empire: "It's *way* more than that."
links.text: It's *way* more than that.

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Phasmid... Jude, I think we should..."
links.text: "Phasmid... Jude, I think we should just go and write Harry a station call. It's getting..."

links.title: Cuno: ""Fucking... listen to him, pig! Gra..."
links.text: "Fucking... listen to him, pig! Grandpa's *deranged*. Cuno knows you don't believe this phasmid shit -- but he was hatin' rich people, some kind of *pederasts* too... fuckin' hating *everything*."

links.title: Cuno: ""Worse than Cuno's violent dad. Sha..."
links.text: "Worse than Cuno's violent dad. Shakes like a pig, eyes like saucers. Wavin' at nothing. That's some dark shit -- and he's been with that bug for like -- ever. Don't close your mind to this shit!"

links.title: Rhetoric: "Hah!"
links.text: Hah!

links.title: You: ""Listen -- he was acting violent. S..."
links.text: "Listen -- he was acting violent. Scatterbrained. In a *fragile* mental state."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Yeah, okay, I get it -- people dev..."
links.text: "Yeah, okay, I get it -- people develop fucked up psyches in solitude. If he's been hiding for fifty *years* it's understandable."

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah, he was like a fuckin' assass..."
links.text: "Yeah, he was like a fuckin' assassin, tell him..."

links.title: You: ""He's a trained sniper. The weapon..."
links.text: "He's a trained sniper. The weapon he used is more than capable of making the shot."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Okay-okay..." He rubs his temples...."
links.text: "Okay-okay..." He rubs his temples. "Will he confess? To *prosecution*? No phasmid weirdness, just straight up confess?"

links.title: You: ""The state he's in now? I don't kno..."
links.text: "The state he's in now? I don't know. But *we* got a confession -- he confessed to us."

links.title: Judit Minot: ""A detective *and* a civilian. Jean..."
links.text: "A detective *and* a civilian. Jean -- *and* the gun. He has it..."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Okay. We'll see about it when we g..."
links.text: "Okay. We'll see about it when we get coast guard on the island."

links.title: Physical Instrument: "This left a mark. They can't deny i..."
links.text: This left a mark. They can't deny it, son -- you got the bastard.

links.title: Authority: "There. No one is saying anything. T..."
links.text: There. No one is saying anything. The silence agrees.

links.title: Logic: "This is good. They can't deny it."
links.text: This is good. They can't deny it.

links.title: You: ""I think once he's resuscitated --..."
links.text: "I think once he's resuscitated -- yes. We got him talking once. He'll talk again."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""*Resuscitated* -- that sounds grea..."
links.text: "*Resuscitated* -- that sounds great..."

links.title: Judit Minot: ""Jean. He has it. No more cooperati..."
links.text: "Jean. He has it. No more cooperation needed. He had a civilian there for the confession -- this is doable."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Cryptozoology? You're giving me *c..."
links.text: "Cryptozoology? You're giving me *cryptozoology*? Trant was feeling *pity* for you -- you use the chance to go *full crypto*!"

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""I'm pulling the plug on this *stra..."
links.text: "I'm pulling the plug on this *straggler* thing." He shakes his head. "You're gonna get a station call to explain what happened. Coast guard is gonna scan the island. That's it."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Cryptozoology? You're giving me *c..."
links.text: "Cryptozoology? You're giving me *cryptozoology*? You say you have a motive and you use the chance to go *full crypto* on me!"

links.title: You: ""Actually, I'm not that sure if I *..."
links.text: "Actually, I'm not that sure if I *have* a motive. I had another thing..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, detective -- we *have* a motiv..."
links.text: "No, detective -- we *have* a motive..." He gestures for you to speak up.

links.title: Authority: "Take the advice."
links.text: Take the advice.

links.title: Cuno: ""Pig, what the fuck is wrong with y..."
links.text: "Pig, what the fuck is wrong with you?! Why you choking? Lay it on them! We have it!"

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Of course. There *is* no motive......"
links.text: "Of course. There *is* no motive..." He sighs.

links.title: You: ""You have to believe me. There *was..."
links.text: "You have to believe me. There *was* a giant phasmid on the island."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""No -- I don't *have* to believe yo..."
links.text: "No -- I don't *have* to believe you made a *zoological discovery*. That is not a must. And even if you did... you're a cop. Who cares?"

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""You know, Harry -- if I may interr..."
links.text: "You know, Harry -- if I may interrupt -- it would help if you had *evidence*. Any proof -- and I'd play ball here. The PR potential would be quite something for the RCM."

links.title: Cuno: ""Suit, we have a *shitload* of proo..."
links.text: "Suit, we have a *shitload* of proof. Spin it on them, pig!"

links.title: Suggestion: "They're not going to consider more..."
links.text: They're not going to consider more than one piece of evidence -- choose wisely.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Put the best proof forth. As solid..."
links.text: Put the best proof forth. As solid as you've got.

links.title: You: ""It had gathered *items* in its nes..."
links.text: "It had gathered *items* in its nest: behold, a passport."

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""Some kind of a... what were they c..."
links.text: "Some kind of a... what were they called? A bower? Yes. Things collected for a mating display. This would indicate a male. But... I don't know of *insects* displaying bowery behaviour."

links.title: Cuno: ""Shit was there -- display the shit..."
links.text: "Shit was there -- display the shit, pig. The shit! It's the proof."

links.title: You: ""This was there." (Show him the hel..."
links.text: "This was there." (Show him the helmet.)

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""It's a helmet. From the victim. No..."
links.text: "It's a helmet. From the victim. Nothing about this even *remotely* proves the existence of a giant insect. Here's my theory, Harry."

links.title: You: ""It had taken this -- from the kill..."
links.text: "It had taken this -- from the killer." (Show him the scope.)

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""It's a scope. From a gun. Nothing..."
links.text: "It's a scope. From a gun. Nothing about this even *remotely* proves the existence of a giant insect. Here's my theory, Harry."

links.title: You: ""*This* is especially strange." (Sh..."
links.text: "*This* is especially strange." (Show him the passport.)

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""It's a passport. Waterlogged paper..."
links.text: "It's a passport. Waterlogged paper. Nothing about this even *remotely* proves the existence of a giant insect. Here's my theory, Harry."

links.title: You: ""It had gathered *items* in its nes..."
links.text: "It had gathered *items* in its nest: a helmet, a scope, and a passport."

links.title: You: ""It had gathered *items* in its nes..."
links.text: "It had gathered *items* in its nest: a helmet and a scope."

links.title: You: ""I know things about it. I think it..."
links.text: "I know things about it. I think it reproduces by parthenogenesis."

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""Well, that's not exactly *proof*...."
links.text: "Well, that's not exactly *proof*. It's a theory. But -- it *is* interesting."

links.title: Cuno: ""Fucking gimp... it's more than *in..."
links.text: "Fucking gimp... it's more than *interesting*. Cuno's pig's laying down science here. Shit's legit."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Okay. One question -- how do you k..."
links.text: "Okay. One question -- how do you know that?"

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""And how do you know that?""
links.text: "And how do you know that?"

links.title: You: ""I examined the insect. Up close.""
links.text: "I examined the insect. Up close."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""What you're giving us -- it's not..."
links.text: "What you're giving us -- it's not news. It's not proof. Or an observation. It's a cryptozoological factoid. You can get it from Paradox B, Aquarius, any *mystery* station. Here's *my* theory."

links.title: You: ""I approached it and had a conversa..."
links.text: "I approached it and had a conversation with it. We talked."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Talked? Okay. What you're giving u..."
links.text: "Talked? Okay. What you're giving us -- it's not news. It's not proof. Or an observation. It's a cryptozoological factoid. You can get it from Paradox B, Aquarius, any *mystery* station. Here's *my* theory."

links.title: You: ""Intuition. Turns out I have a wide..."
links.text: "Intuition. Turns out I have a wide intellectual base in here." (Point to your head.)

links.title: Drama: "You did not -- under any circumstan..."
links.text: You did not -- under any circumstances -- *talk* to it.

links.title: You: ""It emits a chemical that makes it..."
links.text: "It emits a chemical that makes it look *more* like the reeds."

links.title: You: ""Its nervous system is stored in it..."
links.text: "Its nervous system is stored in its *limbs*."

links.title: You: ""It was completely white on the ins..."
links.text: "It was completely white on the inside, but brown and beige on the outside. Like reeds."

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah, and it had like these... tuf..."
links.text: "Yeah, and it had like these... tufts of reeds on it. Even after it unfolded. And bitch -- it unfolded like crazy! It was fucking beautiful."

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""That's not *proof*, it's a descrip..."
links.text: "That's not *proof*, it's a description. But -- befitting a stick insect. If it's camouflaged to look like the reeds then it would have to be pretty large."

links.title: Cuno: ""Large?!" The kid slaps his forehea..."
links.text: "Large?!" The kid slaps his forehead in disbelief. "Gimp, it was fucking *gigantic*!"

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""What you're giving us is not news...."
links.text: "What you're giving us is not news. It's not proof, it's not even an observation. It's a cryptozoological factoid. You can get it from Paradox B, Aquarius, any *mystery* station..." He stops. "Here's *my* theory."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""You experienced a *delirium halluc..."
links.text: "You experienced a *delirium hallucination*. It's typical of cognitive damage. From years of chronic alcoholism. You started *seeing shit* in the reeds -- and convinced this poor kid of it too."

links.title: Cuno: ""POOR kid?! Fuck you, f****t! Cuno'..."
links.text: "POOR kid?! Fuck you, f****t! Cuno's loaded!" The boy clenches his bony fists so hard the knuckles turn white. "Can't *believe* you're not believing me..."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""You experienced a *delirium halluc..."
links.text: "You experienced a *delirium hallucination*. It's typical of cognitive damage. From chronic alcoholism. Which is what you have. So you started *seeing shit* in the reeds."

links.title: Half Light: "Maybe it's true?"
links.text: Maybe it's true?

links.title: Inland Empire: "No. It's not true. It was there. It..."
links.text: No. It's not true. It was there. It was real. You remember every detail of its sounds, its movements, its presence...

links.title: You: ""I *did* hallucinate a talking tie...."
links.text: "I *did* hallucinate a talking tie..."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""The tie's talking again -- that's..."
links.text: "The tie's talking again -- that's it. No more phasmid-talk. There's no PR-value in delirium tremens."

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""Plants turning into bugs *is* a ty..."
links.text: "Plants turning into bugs *is* a typical hallucination. Arche-typical even, dating back to many ancient tribal societies."

links.title: Cuno: ""Fucking... Cuno doesn't have a pho..."
links.text: "Fucking... Cuno doesn't have a photo camera 'cause Cuno *is* fucking POOR, okay?! That sucks about the Cuno. So Cuno didn't take a fucking PHOTO. And Cuno didn't paint a fucking picture."

links.title: Cuno: "He points to his skull. "But it's i..."
links.text: He points to his skull. "But it's in my head. In here. Cuno's *eyes* took the picture. It's RIGHT FUCKING HERE. I can't BELIEVE you're not getting this..." He grinds his teeth.

links.title: Judit Minot: ""Cuno -- please. If it's on the isl..."
links.text: "Cuno -- please. If it's on the island, then it will be seen again. Calm down..."

links.title: Cuno: ""It will NEVER be seen again! It wa..."
links.text: "It will NEVER be seen again! It wasn't seen for a *hundred* years. Fuck Cuno and let's all pretend there was no miracle. We don't need a giant insect, everything is so *good* without it in this fuck-hole..." He looks around.

links.title: Volition: "The sheer willpower in him MUST be..."
links.text: The sheer willpower in him MUST be making some dent in their incredulity. Some part of them must be thinking...

links.title: Logic: "...if he is *that* certain. And the..."
links.text: ...if he is *that* certain. And they are not. C'mon...

links.title: Judit Minot: ""Fuck it -- I believe him." She loo..."
links.text: "Fuck it -- I believe him." She looks at Vicquemare and shrugs.

links.title: Cuno: ""I knew it! The bitch sees it. Bitc..."
links.text: "I knew it! The bitch sees it. Bitches are fucking *smart*. But you dicks are dumb as fuck! It's real, I told you."

links.title: Suggestion: "Move on. Don't gloat."
links.text: Move on. Don't gloat.

links.title: Rhetoric: "That's it. The argument is lost."
links.text: That's it. The argument is lost.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "You know, maybe you should become a..."
links.text: You know, maybe you should become a beach bum? Just a thought... Because this isn't going too good.

links.title: You: ""I *did* have a conversation with a..."
links.text: "I *did* have a conversation with a corpse..."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""With a corpse? That's it. No more..."
links.text: "With a corpse? That's it. No more phasmid-talk. There's no PR-value in delirium tremens."

links.title: You: ""Maybe I got too deep into what the..."
links.text: "Maybe I got too deep into what the cryptozoologists were telling me..."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Literal *cryptozoologists* are inv..."
links.text: "Literal *cryptozoologists* are involved? That's it. No more phasmid-talk. There's no PR-value in delirium tremens."

links.title: You: ""The damage alcohol has done to my..."
links.text: "The damage alcohol has done to my mind *is* extensive..."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""No shit.""
links.text: "No shit."

links.title: You: ""No. I know what I saw. It was *rea..."
links.text: "No. I know what I saw. It was *real*."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Bugs everywhere. *Plants* turning..."
links.text: "Bugs everywhere. *Plants* turning into bugs. It's a typical hallucination. Every drunk past the age of forty has seen it."

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""You're right about that...""
links.text: "You're right about that..."

links.title: You: ""The previous head of the Débardeur..."
links.text: "The previous head of the Débardeurs' Union was assassinated by *our* killer."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""This is a conversation for when we..."
links.text: "This is a conversation for when we are no longer out in the open, in Martinaise, where Evrart and Edgar Claire have ears everywhere." The lieutenant lowers his voice -- just a little.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "And eyes too -- your return from th..."
links.text: And eyes too -- your return from the island must not have gone unnoticed.

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Understood. Of course.""
links.text: "Understood. Of course."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "But a case against Evrart would be..."
links.text: But a case against Evrart would be big...
