links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""I would prefer *not* to partake in..."
links.text: "I would prefer *not* to partake in anything Union-related." The consultant, too, has lowered his voice. "For political neutrality."

links.title: Logic: "This has to be good stuff for him t..."
links.text: This has to be good stuff for him to backpedal out of it at first mention.

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""What?" He lowers his voice. "On be..."
links.text: "What?" He lowers his voice. "On behalf of..."

links.title: You: ""The fatso.""
links.text: "The fatso."

links.title: Trant Heidelstam: ""For the sake of political neutrali..."
links.text: "For the sake of political neutrality I would like to *not* partake in anything Union-related."

links.title: Logic: "This has to be good stuff for him t..."
links.text: This has to be good stuff for him to backpedal out of it at first mention.

links.title: Cuno: ""The fuck, you puss? This'll send s..."
links.text: "The fuck, you puss? This'll send shit flying. Trust Cuno. Grandpa laid down some real shit. *Conspiracy*-style."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""If that's even remotely true, then..."
links.text: "If that's even remotely true, then a clandestine investigation will be required. It smells like *bad news* to me -- a classic shitkid case that'll get people killed. Or fired."

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Not discussing it further *out here..."
links.text: Not discussing it further *out here in the open* is probably a good idea. People must have seen you return from the island. Word travels fast...

links.title: You: ""Edgar Claire.""
links.text: "Edgar Claire."

links.title: You: "Just nod."
links.text: Just nod.

links.title: You: ""*And* I also fixed the strike situ..."
links.text: "*And* I also fixed the strike situation."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""How? It seems to be ongoing. I see..."
links.text: "How? It seems to be ongoing. I see red banners on the gates."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""He didn't quite *solve* it -- he c..."
links.text: "He didn't quite *solve* it -- he cross-pollinated information between the company rep and Evrart. Until the rep came to see that the Union desires war. At which point Mrs. Messier decided to..." He shrugs.

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""What? Hand Claire the terminal?""
links.text: "What? Hand Claire the terminal?"

links.title: You: ""It was an accident.""
links.text: "It was an accident."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""You bet it was. Sounds to me like..."
links.text: "You bet it was. Sounds to me like you got *played* -- because you were off your tits on Al Gul."

links.title: You: ""Maybe...""
links.text: "Maybe..."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Maybe? Certainly. You're Evrart Cl..."
links.text: "Maybe? Certainly. You're Evrart Claire's go-to-guy now. He's a *mob boss*, did you know?"

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Is that why you want us to investi..."
links.text: "Is that why you want us to investigate the assassination of the previous Union head thing? To get off Evrart's hook?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No. It's *nothing* like that. He w..."
links.text: "No. It's *nothing* like that. He was reckless with information -- but ethical. We don't owe anyone anything. This allowed us to stabilize things in Martinaise."

links.title: Judit Minot: ""God... Calm down, Jean.""
links.text: "God... Calm down, Jean."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's not *quite* like that... The..."
links.text: "It's not *quite* like that... The move allowed us to stabilize things here. It was *not* bad for Martinaise. And we don't owe anyone anything."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Okay..." A slow nod."
links.text: "Okay..." A slow nod.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Silence. Good. The man doesn't know..."
links.text: Silence. Good. The man doesn't know what to say.

links.title: Cuno: ""You fucking twisting his words aga..."
links.text: "You fucking twisting his words again! My pig's not *dirty*. This is fucking *paladin* shit. He don't bend like that. Tell em --" He gestures for you to speak.

links.title: Cuno: ""You fucking twisting his words aga..."
links.text: "You fucking twisting his words again! My pig's wasn't *duped*. This pig's fucking *mastermind* shit. He doesn't do like that. He doesn't get fucked. Tell em --" He gestures for you to speak.

links.title: Judit Minot: ""Jean, stop brutalizing him... He's..."
links.text: "Jean, stop brutalizing him... He's trying."

links.title: You: ""Hey -- how do you know about Al Gu..."
links.text: "Hey -- how do you know about Al Gul?"

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""It doesn't matter how I know about..."
links.text: "It doesn't matter how I know about *Al Gul*. What matters is -- you're Evrart Claire's messenger now. A *Union man*, as he calls it. He's a *mob boss*, did you know?"

links.title: You: ""I did it for the World Revolution.""
links.text: "I did it for the World Revolution."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""...""
You: ""Vrrr... Viva la Revolución!""
links.text: "Vrrr... Viva la Revolución!"

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Cool. To me it sounds like you got..."
links.text: "Cool. To me it sounds like you got played by Evrart Claire. Duped -- for the hundredth time."

links.title: You: ""Eat the pigs!""
links.text: "Eat the pigs!"

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Fuck you. You just got played by E..."
links.text: "Fuck you. You just got played by Evrart Claire. Duped -- for the hundredth time."

links.title: You: ""Yeah. But for, like, conservative..."
links.text: "Yeah. But for, like, conservative Revolution."

links.title: You: ""Yeah -- I actually just got manipu..."
links.text: "Yeah -- I actually just got manipulated into it."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""You think? Claire played you like..."
links.text: "You think? Claire played you like a fiddle. You got duped -- for the hundredth time."

links.title: You: ""I just told some people some thing..."
links.text: "I just told some people some things. No big deal. Things are calmer now."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Sounds like you got *played*, Harr..."
links.text: "Sounds like you got *played*, Harry. Because you were off your tits on Al Gul."

links.title: You: ""I masterminded a solution to an un..."
links.text: "I masterminded a solution to an unsolvable problem."

links.title: You: ""I moved information between the co..."
links.text: "I moved information between the company rep and Evrart. Until the rep came to see that the Union *wants* war. At which point Mrs. Messier decided to go."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Go? And *hand* the terminal over t..."
links.text: "Go? And *hand* the terminal over to the Claire brothers?"

links.title: You: ""Yeah... maybe I didn't.""
links.text: "Yeah... maybe I didn't."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""You think?""
links.text: "You think?"

links.title: You: ""There was also a dead man -- on th..."
links.text: "There was also a dead man -- on the boardwalk. A missing person I found."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Yes-yes. Fallen through a gap in t..."
links.text: "Yes-yes. Fallen through a gap in the boardwalk, drunk."

links.title: You: ""How did you know I found him?""
links.text: "How did you know I found him?"

links.title: Judit Minot: ""The body was transported to Precin..."
links.text: "The body was transported to Precinct 41. Our morgue. I had Tillbrook and Mollins take care of funeral arrangements and family-stuff."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""You're not the only cop in the wor..."
links.text: "You're not the only cop in the world, Harry. This all comes back to us."

links.title: Judit Minot: ""Still," she says quietly. "Good wo..."
links.text: "Still," she says quietly. "Good work with the missing person, detective."

links.title: Authority: "It's still a point for you. No deny..."
links.text: It's still a point for you. No denying it.

links.title: You: ""I also looked into the mystery of..."
links.text: "I also looked into the mystery of the Doomed Commercial Area."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: "He shrugs. "I don't know what a 'Do..."
links.text: He shrugs. "I don't know what a 'Doomed Commercial Area' is."

links.title: You: ""Rue de Saint-Ghislaine 10. A comme..."
links.text: "Rue de Saint-Ghislaine 10. A commercial building where all businesses go bankrupt. I looked into it."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""*Why*? That's not what you were su..."
links.text: "*Why*? That's not what you were supposed to do here."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There was a *fridge* we needed. An..."
links.text: "There was a *fridge* we needed. And a possible witness. He was just chasing a lead and ended up advising a local shopkeeper -- it was okay."

links.title: Judit Minot: ""Of course." She turns to Vicquemar..."
links.text: "Of course." She turns to Vicquemare. "Call it community outreach, right?"

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Dodged the bullet there. For a mome..."
links.text: Dodged the bullet there. For a moment it seemed like you were just wasting time.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There was a possible witness in th..."
links.text: "There was a possible witness in there. And it was close to the crime scene. He was just chasing a lead and ended up advising a local shopkeeper -- it was okay."

links.title: Cuno: ""This pig *helps* people, okay? He'..."
links.text: "This pig *helps* people, okay? He's a fuckin' handy helper, he does that shit. He finds insects and solves side-shit. It's his style. Side-style."

links.title: Judit Minot: ""Jean -- it *is* his style.""
links.text: "Jean -- it *is* his style."

links.title: Inland Empire: "It's *definitely* your style to sol..."
links.text: It's *definitely* your style to solve *side-shit*.

links.title: Judit Minot: ""Jean -- it's his style. He does si..."
links.text: "Jean -- it's his style. He does side cases. I'm sure it was important enough. Call it community outreach."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""It's not what he was sent here to..."
links.text: "It's not what he was sent here to do. He was sent here to solve a murder -- not look into commercial areas."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Damn, now it sounds like you were j..."
links.text: Damn, now it sounds like you were just wasting time.

links.title: You: ""The curse turned out to be possibl..."
links.text: "The curse turned out to be possibly entroponetical. Part of my larger investigation -- into Martinaise itself."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""No, it didn't -- it didn't turn ou..."
links.text: "No, it didn't -- it didn't turn out to be entroponetical *again*. Enough with the isolary-pale two-millimetre-hole-in-the-world line. This isn't Paradox B. We're a police force."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Paradox B is a fringe science magaz..."
links.text: Paradox B is a fringe science magazine published in Graad. Its mission is to explain theories like telekinesis and intraisolary pale, before they get out of hand.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "It doesn't look like the lieutenant..."
links.text: It doesn't look like the lieutenant wishes you to push this angle further.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "'Cut it out' is indeed what he is t..."
links.text: 'Cut it out' is indeed what he is thinking.

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""What were you even doing in some c..."
links.text: "What were you even doing in some commercial area? Your *job* was to solve a murder, not *Martinaise*."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Damn, now it sounds like you were j..."
links.text: Damn, now it sounds like you were just wasting time.

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""I'm 100% sure it didn't *turn out*..."
links.text: "I'm 100% sure it didn't *turn out* to be that. You know, cut the amateur entroponetic two-millimetre-hole shit -- this isn't Paradox B. We're a police force."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""No, it didn't -- it didn't turn ou..."
links.text: "No, it didn't -- it didn't turn out to be entroponetical *again*. Enough with two millimetre holes and the giant bugs -- this isn't Paradox B. We're a police force."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Yeah, I'm not going to waste more..."
links.text: "Yeah, I'm not going to waste more time with this -- whatever it was, it wasn't entroponetical, or a giant bug. Cut the Paradox B shit, we're a police force."

links.title: You: ""Nothing. It's not important.""
links.text: "Nothing. It's not important."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Yeah, honestly -- it doesn't sound..."
links.text: "Yeah, honestly -- it doesn't sound too important. Since it's not connected to the case -- or a giant living organism."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""It's not what you were *sent* to d..."
links.text: "It's not what you were *sent* to do here."

links.title: You: ""It may only be a small thing, but..."
links.text: "It may only be a small thing, but I found a man's jacket!"

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Yes, we can *see* the jacket. Fuck..."
links.text: "Yes, we can *see* the jacket. Fuck the world. Fuck police duty. Fuck Jean Vicquemare -- that's what it says to me. Fuck me. We've been through this."

links.title: Rhetoric: "Dammit. Not *that* jacket, the one..."
links.text: Dammit. Not *that* jacket, the one you got for the Doom Spiral. Forget it... It's not worth the effort.

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Yes, we can see the jacket. 'Hey e..."
links.text: "Yes, we can see the jacket. 'Hey everybody -- I'm working undercover in a *hard fetish gang*. I don't care about anyone or anything.' We've been through this."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""You're right. It's *is* a small th..."
links.text: "You're right. It's *is* a small thing." He looks around. "Does anyone care? About a jacket? No one?"

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "Silence. The wind blows."
links.text: Silence. The wind blows.

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""See -- no one cares.""
links.text: "See -- no one cares."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't even know which jacket he'..."
links.text: "I don't even know which jacket he's talking about. There have been... many things that he's found. He gets meticulous. But it's okay."

links.title: You: ""I confiscated drugs from Cuno's da..."
links.text: "I confiscated drugs from Cuno's dad."

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah -- he really fucked the Cuno..."
links.text: "Yeah -- he really fucked the Cuno on that," the kid says with a respectful glance. "But that's old shit. Cuno's now. Pig's just being a good pig. That's cool to Cuno."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Great. Thanks." He turns to you. "..."
links.text: "Great. Thanks." He turns to you. "You snorted the drugs. I know you did. Fuck it. It's all right. I mean -- honestly. *Anything* but the drink."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Who's *Cuno*?""
links.text: "Who's *Cuno*?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You don't want to know.""
links.text: "You don't want to know."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""You're right, lieutenant -- I don'..."
links.text: "You're right, lieutenant -- I don't." He turns to you. "You snorted the drugs, I know you did. It's all right, I mean, at this point -- *anything* is but the drink."

links.title: You: ""Cuno's great. I should have taken..."
links.text: "Cuno's great. I should have taken him to the island. He'd tell you it's all true."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""I don't care. You took some drugs..."
links.text: "I don't care. You took some drugs from some kid. And then snorted them. It's all right -- honestly. *Anything* but the drink."

links.title: You: ""Cuno's a street kid I helped.""
links.text: "Cuno's a street kid I helped."

links.title: You: ""To hell with it. You wouldn't unde..."
links.text: "To hell with it. You wouldn't understand anyway."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Agreed.""
links.text: "Agreed."

links.title: You: ""So what do you say? Wanna take thi..."
links.text: "So what do you say? Wanna take this hot shit back?" (Point to yourself.)

links.title: Authority: "It's not going well. You have to pr..."
links.text: It's not going well. You have to present something sane and forceful. Make your case. You've done stuff. Good stuff.

links.title: You: ""The biggest land invertebrate ever..."
links.text: "The biggest land invertebrate ever found? It's anything but funny. Also, I think it's connected to the case."

links.title: You: ""I talked to it. It told me about t..."
links.text: "I talked to it. It told me about the pale and the Oxygen Holocaust, and how its antenna turned into a foot."

links.title: You: ""Ha ha ha..." (Laugh nervously.) "I..."
links.text: "Ha ha ha..." (Laugh nervously.) "I don't know why I won't stop talking about the *three-metres-tall stick insect*. There was no insect!"

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""This sounds hysterical, Harry. Wha..."
links.text: "This sounds hysterical, Harry. What did you *do* on that island? What happened to you?"

links.title: You: ""I don't know. What I *do* know is..."
links.text: "I don't know. What I *do* know is -- there was no giant stick insect on the island. That would be insane."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""What is this, a joke? We *will* du..."
links.text: "What is this, a joke? We *will* dump you, Harry. We will leave you here -- you'll be just another bum on the coast. This is a *trial*. Stop fucking around."

links.title: You: "Gulp."
links.text: Gulp.

links.title: Judit Minot: ""Speak up, lieutenant," she tries t..."
links.text: "Speak up, lieutenant," she tries to reassure you. "It's okay. I believe there was a straggler."

dialogueTree.title: You: ""If Kim were here right now, he'd t..."
dialogueTree.text: "If Kim were here right now, he'd tell you it was inevitable."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Don't make this about Lieutenant K..."
links.text: "Don't make this about Lieutenant Kitsuragi. He's a *great* cop -- and you almost got him killed. I don't even understand why you're *here* after he got shot."

dialogueTree.title: You: ""I got shot too -- in that fight."..."
dialogueTree.text: "I got shot too -- in that fight." (Point to your leg.) "I did my absolute best."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""You went in drunk and you got your..."
links.text: "You went in drunk and you got yourself shot -- and others killed." He sighs, then continues more calmly: "Why are you even *here* after Kitsuragi got shot?"

dialogueTree.title: You: ""That's right, it was a massacre. T..."
dialogueTree.text: "That's right, it was a massacre. They got what was coming to them."

links.title: Jean Vicquemare: ""Who? Who got what was coming to th..."
links.text: "Who? Who got what was coming to them? The civilians? Lieutenant Kitsuragi? Why are you even *here* after he got shot? What else could you possibly fuck up?"
